

/*
cool organizing structure
-d 2 -s 2 -g 180 -r 121727122 -u

strober by livs
-d 2 -s 2 -g 180 -r 12172712266040859999593583344434343434343 -u

odd top growth pattern
-d 2 -s 2 -g 180 -r 1203601468634862934312172712266040859999593583344434333434343430090909 -u

weird snakes in lines
echo "1010101010010101001010001001010010111010101" | ./hardcash -d 2 -s 2 -g 200 -r 9995935929011192 -u -i
*/
